issue.title: [JS] Add ability to construct a Table from a list of Arrays/TypedArrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2766](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2766). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Something like 
```javascript

Table.from({'col1': [...], 'col2': [...], 'col3': [...]})
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2766?focusedCommentId=16741641) by Paul Taylor (paul.e.taylor):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3290
[https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3290](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3290)
